h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
h3_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two
content: Lastly, you'll see him use the Somersault Cloud spell to zoom around the area, hit you, and dash off. He will try to grab you when using this, so it's important to learn the timings and roll away as often as possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone' and the sub-subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
Lastly, you'll see him use the Somersault Cloud spell to zoom around the area, hit you, and dash off. He will try to grab you when using this, so it's important to learn the timings and roll away as often as possible.
